title: Скажені сусіди
overview: It's not just the wedding.Wild weddings are over, but frenzied adventures in Yablunivka continue!Two families – Serediuks and Kryzhanivskis – are engaged in an eternal Ukrainian competition: who has the taller house, the greener grass, and the cleverer children. Day or night, summer or winter – they always have time, inspiration, and imagination to play dirty tricks on their neighbours.
